module.name: PIN Sets
module.description: Allow creation of lists of PINs (numbers for passwords) that can be used by other modules (eg, trunks).
module.changelog: *2.5.0.2* localization updates *2.5.0.1* #3240, #3258 *2.5.0* #2845, #2764 tabindex *2.4.0.1* #2843 Russian Translation *2.4.0* bump for 2.4 *1.2.3* #2393 add support for pinless dialing *1.2.2.2* #2172 deprecated use of | *1.2.2.1* bump for rc1 *1.2.2* Put None label in menu hook *1.2.1* #1770 added proper uninstall *1.2* Add SQLite3 support, fixes http://freepbx.org/trac/ticket/1778 *1.1* Add he_IL translation, add naftali5's fixes where pinsets were being lost when moved around. *1.0.11* Stop potential error where a random pinset is appearing when creating a new trunk
